attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Balfour Declaration of 1917 was the promise of Palestine as a Jewish homeland state. 

In 1921 The British Empire ruled approximately one-quarter of the world's population.

In 1922, Churchill's White Paper, denied that a Jewish state was the intention and conveniently broke the original promise, by dividing the land and creating Transjordan.

This has come at a high price creating many of the Arab-Israeli problems we face today and the steady decline of The British Empire.

Will The British Government honour this broken promise today before it's too late?
